mapper.insert: insert into SHANGJIARKLED (DD, STATUS, QTY, COUNTBOXNO) values (#{dd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{countboxno,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SHANGJIARKLED
DD,
STATUS,
QTY,
COUNTBOXNO,
#{dd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{countboxno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: select sum(qty) sumQty,sum(countboxno) countQty from shangjiarkLed where dd = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')

select sum(qty) sumQty,sum(countBoxno) countQty from ( select sum(qty) qty,sum(countboxno) countBoxno from shangjiarkLed where dd = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = '9' union SELECT sum(qty) qty,count(distinct boxno) countBoxno FROM WMS_BOX_BIND WHERE boxno like '%P%' AND STATUS = '99' and trunc(sysdate) = trunc(finishdate) )

select sum(qty) qty,sum(countBoxno) countBoxno from ( select sum(qty) qty,sum(countboxno) countBoxno from shangjiarkLed where status <> '9' union SELECT sum(qty) qty,count(distinct boxno) countBoxno FROM WMS_BOX_BIND WHERE boxno like '%P%' AND STATUS <> '99' )
select count(distinct boxno_bind) countQty,sum(nvl(susr1,1)) sumQty from caseid where to_char(adddate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and BOXNO_BIND LIKE '%P%' AND contouttaskno IS NOT NULL
select count(distinct boxno_bind) countQty,sum(nvl(susr1,1)) sumQty from caseid where to_char(adddate,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and BOXNO_BIND LIKE '%P%' AND contouttaskno <> '0'
select count(distinct old_id) countQty, sum(qty) sumQty from pickdetail where uom = 2 and old_loc = '42SMART' and status = '0'
select count(distinct old_id) countQty, sum(qty) sumQty from pickdetail where uom = 2 and old_loc = '42SMART' and to_char(pick_date, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and status <> '0'
select count(distinct id) from xsogroupdetail where idstatus in ('2')
select count(distinct id) from xsogroupdetail where to_char(TRAYS_OUT_TIME,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and idstatus in ('3')

select count(distinct boxno_bind) countQty, sum(nvl(susr1, 1)) sumQty from caseid where to_char(caseouttime, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and BOXNO_BIND LIKE '%P%' AND contouttaskno in ('2', '3') group by to_char(adddate, 'yyyymmdd')

select (select sum(qty) from replenishment where status <> '4' and qty>0 and trunc(sysdate)=trunc(adddate)) sumQty, (select count(0) from (select id from replenishment where status <> '4' and qty>0 and trunc(sysdate)=trunc(adddate) group by id)) countQty, (select sum(qtyinpickloc) from replenishment where status='9' and trunc(sysdate)=trunc(adddate)) completeQty, (select count(0) from (select id from replenishment where status='9' and trunc(sysdate)=trunc(adddate) group by id)) completeCount from dual
select sum(qtyinpickloc) sumQty,count (distinct id) countQty from replenishment where status='9' and trunc(sysdate)=trunc(adddate)
select sum(qtyinpickloc) sumQty,count (distinct id) countQty from replenishment where status in('0','1','2')
